rev.desc.rev.desc: Remove references to ServiceCenter
Panel select.activity
Changed the no records found exit to check.next.
devtx ticket I1812 - use "common name" instead of tablename for print of record list
on set.header.defaults changed:
if ($L.qbe=true) then ($report.title.1="Print of "+filename($L.file)+" record list";$report.title.2="")
to:
if ($L.qbe=true) then ($L.tablename=scmsg(filename($L.file), "tablename");$L.title=nullsub($L.tablename, filename($L.file));$report.title.1="Print of "+$L.title+" record list";$report.title.2="")
devtx BUG13075
On check.special decision panel, modified condition for the get.joinfile exit to allow for printing of asset joinfile formats.
Fixed problem with background printing.

Added probsummary to the list of files so that it will print using the correct format as defined in the category definition. probsummary file is called during the browse mode; problem file is called during the edit - by having both files in the array, all print areas are covered. Panel is check.special.
Changed the condition for exit on check.special to check filename of problem instead of probsummary so that using a category print format will work and not just use the base form of the display form.
Position to first in list if processing all records.
scmsg
Will not try to create a copy of the format control record if it is not already there.
Will not make changes to FC record passed in even if NULL.
Now handles server printing correctly.
Changed to allow override of special formats.
Added variable for number of copies.

descript.descript: Remove references to ServiceCenter
Panel select.activity
Changed the no records found exit to check.next.
devtx ticket I1812 - use "common name" instead of tablename for print of record list
on set.header.defaults changed:
if ($L.qbe=true) then ($report.title.1="Print of "+filename($L.file)+" record list";$report.title.2="")
to:
if ($L.qbe=true) then ($L.tablename=scmsg(filename($L.file), "tablename");$L.title=nullsub($L.tablename, filename($L.file));$report.title.1="Print of "+$L.title+" record list";$report.title.2="")
devtx BUG13075
On check.special decision panel, modified condition for the get.joinfile exit to allow for printing of asset joinfile formats.
Fixed problem with background printing.

Added probsummary to the list of files so that it will print using the correct format as defined in the category definition. probsummary file is called during the browse mode; problem file is called during the edit - by having both files in the array, all print areas are covered. Panel is check.special.
Changed the condition for exit on check.special to check filename of problem instead of probsummary so that using a category print format will work and not just use the base form of the display form.
Position to first in list if processing all records.
scmsg
Will not try to create a copy of the format control record if it is not already there.
Will not make changes to FC record passed in even if NULL.
Now handles server printing correctly.
Changed to allow override of special formats.
Added variable for number of copies.
